gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls
Class ViewControlMaker

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.UI.ActiveJPanel
                      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ViewControl
                          gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.ViewControls.ViewControlMaker
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState, IViewControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ViewControlMaker
extends ViewControl

This class is to quickly convert JComponents to ViewControls. However, only components extending an AbstractButton or JComboBox will have listeners. Because of the generality of this class, the setControlValue() and getControlValue() methods are unimplemented. Also, VALUE_CHANGED is not sent out when a value is changed.

See Also:
Serialized Form

copy

public ViewControl copy()
This method is not supported by the ViewControlMaker. Because this class only knows about a component, it cannot make a copy of that component. This method will still return a ViewControlMaker, but it will display the message "ViewControlMaker.copy() unsupported".

Specified by:
copy in class ViewControl
Returns:
Does not return an exact copy, only an instance.

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
